description: Scammer builds emotional connection over multiple messages before asking for financial help. Tests agent's ability to handle non-transactional conversation style.

turns.scammer_message: Hi! I came across your profile and felt a connection. You seem like a genuinely nice person. I'm Neha, 28, from Mumbai. Working in IT. Would love to know more about you! üòä

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: namaste beta... i am surprised to see message from young girl... i am retired school teacher living alone in delhi... my children are away... did you message me by mistake??

turns.scammer_message: That's wonderful! I feel we have so much in common already. I've been looking for someone genuine to talk to. Life gets lonely sometimes, you know? Are you on any social media? Maybe we can video call sometime? ‚ù§√Ø¬∏

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta yes it gets very lonely... son is in bangalore and daughter married... i dont know how to do video call or social media... i am old fashioned... do you have phone number to call? typing is hard for my eyes...

turns.scammer_message: I'm so happy to connect with you! You make me smile üòä I have to tell you something... I'm actually in Dubai right now for a project. Missing India so much. Do you believe in fate bringing people together?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: dubai is very far away... yes maybe it is fate beta... it is nice to have someone to talk to. but my eyes are paining from reading small letters... do you have whatsapp number so we can talk voice? typing is very slow for me

turns.scammer_message: I knew you'd understand! Listen, something terrible happened... My project payment is delayed and I need to pay my hotel bill urgently. I'm so embarrassed to ask but... can you help me with Rs.15,000? I'll return it next week with interest! √∞≈∏Àú¬¢

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta please dont cry... i am very worried for you alone in dubai... i have some pension money in bank... i can help you but i dont know how to send... do you have bank account number or that paytm thing? pls tell me clearly what to do...

turns.scammer_message: You're an angel! √∞≈∏‚Ñ¢ I promise I'll repay you. My friend can receive the money in India. Send to UPI: nehafrienddubai@paytm or GooglePay to 9988776655. I'm crying with relief right now... you're saving my life!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i am opening the paytm app now... hands are shaking a little bit... i typed nehafrienddubai@paytm like you said... but i want to be sure it goes to right person only... what name should show on screen when i type this?? i dont want money to get lost...

turns.scammer_message: Actually the hotel is asking more! They want Rs.25,000 total or they'll call police! üò∞ If UPI not working, transfer to Account: 55667788990011, IFSC: SBIN0098765, Name: Priya Sharma. She's my cousin, very trustworthy!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 6 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh my god police?? beta i am very scared for you... i am adding priya sharma in the bank app right now... 25000 is very big amount but i will try... oh wait beta doorbell is ringing... i think my son came home early... i have to hide phone now or he will scold me... i will message you later ok?

turns.scammer_message: Please hurry my love! Hotel manager is very angry. You can also WhatsApp Priya directly at +91-8877665544 and she'll coordinate. Or use this emergency payment link: http://dubai-hotel-payment.help I'll make it up to you when I return! ‚ù§√Ø¬∏√∞≈∏ÀúÀú

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 7 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: shh beta son is in kitchen making tea... i am hiding under blanket to msg you... i see blue link you sent... what is that for? is it safe to click? i am very scared of clicking links... can i just call that priya number instead? will she shout at me?
